question: Which Multilateral funding agency approved USD 3 million to India for fighting Covid-19?
explanation:
Asian Development Bank (ADB) announced that it has approved USD 3 million grant to India, to support the government's response to COVID-19 pandemic.
The grant, which is financed by the Japanese government, is announced under its Asia Pacific Disaster Response Fund. The grant will be used to procure thermal scanners and essential commodities in India.
